name: Cat Bus Cafe
description:
A cute game about managing a bus / cafe full of cats!

Made by Jared Nolen for the LudwigJam 2023.

Tips:

This game can be played entirely with the mouse.

Read the in game tutorial for a basic overview.

When a cat has a red exclamation mark above their head it means they want something. Click them to find out what!

Doing tasks gives you points, so complete as many as you can within the time limit and post your scores in the replies!
